Package de.oth.blocklib.renderer.loader

Class Loader

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.renderer.loader.Loader
public class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
Loads an object into a VAO. The object needs position data, texture data, normals data and indices. Returns a RawModel after uploading the the data edit: Loading is now asynchronous because simulation and rendering are run concurrently.
Author:
edit: Tobias Werner WiSe17/18, edit: Sven Kalle SoSe2018, edit: Loher Florian WiSe21/22

      Parameters:

      Deletes a Shader Storage Buffer Object on the graphics card
      Returns:
      A future object that can be used to chain actions after deletion is completed
